About Me

I Am A Fearless Hunter of Impossible Dreams

BIO

Ade Adesina is a product owner and consultant based out of the Washington DC Metropolitan Area, and an aspiring software engineer. She is a native of Lagos, Nigeria and an avid fan of puppies and coffee.
